channel.title: ::noclip yells something when you type?

item.title: ::noclip yells something when you type?

Idfc, not my server. It works. He’s a happy noob.

item.title: ::noclip yells something when you type?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:5, topic:430619”][code=java]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“noclip”)) {
for (final Player player : PlayerHandler.players) {
final Client o = (Client) player;
o.sendMessage(c.playerName + " tried using ::noclip, they has been kicked.");
c.logout();
}

}[/code][/quote]

how bout now logging the player out while going thru the loop

Read full topic

item.title: ::noclip yells something when you type?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[code=java]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“noclip”)) {
for (final Player player : PlayerHandler.players) {
final Client o = (Client) player;
o.sendMessage(c.playerName + " tried using ::noclip, they has been kicked.");
c.logout();
}

}[/code]

item.title: ::noclip yells something when you type?

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

item.title: ::noclip yells something when you type?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I assume your base is PI. Try, if (playerCommand.startWith("noclip") && (c.playerRights == 0)) { for (final Player player : PlayerHandler.players) { if (player != null) { final Client c2 = (Client) player; c2.sendMessage(+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " tried using ::noclip." + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " has been kicked from the server."); c.logout();

Read full topic

item.title: ::noclip yells something when you type?
item.dc:creator: @killerkody killerkody
item.description:
@killerkody wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“noclip”) &&

c.playerRights == 0){
c.logout();
}

I want it to yell something when they type that command in. Such as “USERNAME” try to noclip lets kick him.

Read full topic
